mapper.select: select fpt.funding_id, fpt.funding_name as funding_title, ut.name as username, CONCAT( IF(NOW() < fpt.end_date, DATEDIFF(fpt.end_date, NOW()), IF(DATEDIFF(NOW(), fpt.end_date) = 0, '오늘 마감', '종료')) ) as deadline, fpt.goal_total, sum(if(ft.funder_id is null, 0, rt.reward_price)) as total_reward_price, fpt.story_title, fpt.story_content, fpt.main_img_url as img_url, ROUND((sum(if(ft.funder_id is null, 0, rt.reward_price)) / fpt.goal_total) * 100) as join_percent from funding_page_tb fpt left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = fpt.user_id) left outer join reward_tb rt on (rt.funding_id = fpt.funding_id) left outer join funder_tb ft on (ft.reward_id = rt.reward_id) where fpt.funding_id = #{pageId};

select rt.reward_id, rt.funding_id, rt.reward_name, rt.reward_price, fpt.end_date from reward_tb rt left outer join funding_page_tb fpt on(fpt.funding_id = rt.funding_id) where rt.funding_id = #{pageId};
